attributes.action: Enact a law that requires that foxes should be called doxes
attributes.additional_details:
All the science to support this petition can be found here:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fox?wprov=sfti1

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog?wprov=sfti1

This is an example of how dogs and foxes (soon to be called doxes) can live in harmony:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Fox_and_the_Hound?wprov=sfti1

https://youtu.be/jN0ORyDfExE
attributes.background: The name fox is not suitable for that animal as it doesn’t properly reflect the fact that a fox has a genetic relationship with a dog. This, amongst other things, could bring an end to the fox hunting debate, because dogs wouldn’t chase foxes if they knew that they had dog ancestory.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Parliament or Government.
